bibl.title: Ptolemy IX at Thebes.
bibl.note: Examines the phraseology of the royal Prenomen and its modification for propagandistic reasons.

bibl.title: Perspectives on Ptolemaic Thebes. Papers from the Theban Workshop 2006.

bibl.seg: RITNER Robert K., Ptolemy IX (Soter II) at Thebes.
Peter F. DORMAN and Betsy M. BRYAN (Edd.), Perspectives on Ptolemaic Thebes. Papers from the Theban Workshop 2006 = SAOC. 65 (Chicago, 2011) pp. 97-114, 9 figg.
Examines the phraseology of the royal Prenomen and its modification for propagandistic reasons.
